title: irfan_pak10
author: irfan_pak10
content: Welcome to bptrades [BountyPortals] buy/sell service provider and escrow service that we offer through our telegram group, Which has already exceeded 200+ Members and, With over 3000+ USD in successful exchanges, you can trust us to safeguard your trades. We are here to facilitate secure and hassle-free trading, providing a trusted platform for buyers and sellers to transact safely.Introduction:Are you tired of scammers and not getting many buyers for your tokens? Bounty Stakes? and other goods? in the crypto world? Look no further! Our Telegram group "bptrades" [Parent company BountyPortals] is dedicated to offering you a secure and reliable platform to trade your products, tokens, stakes, etc. Our Services:We offer various services in this group:Escrow Services: We act as an intermediary party between the Buyer and Seller to hold funds and tokens until both the buyer and seller fulfill their obligations. This ensures a fair and secure transaction.Token Trading: Whether you're looking to buy or sell, you can find opportunities here. You can search for someone who wants to buy/sell unlisted/listed project tokens and give them your offer and we will assist you with the trade. Bounty Stakes Trading: Looking to buy any project bounty stakes, especially bountyportals managed campaign, Please join the group and enjoy stakes trading. Other Goods trading: Anything that is not prohibited, you can trade in the group. Why Choose Our Escrow Services?Currently, we are two people who are offering our escrow services, irfan_pak10 and Albon. We are very trusted at the bitcointalk forum working for many years on this forum. Safety First: Your funds are held securely until the transaction is complete, reducing the risk of fraud or scams.Experienced Team: Especially in this group we have already successfully managed over 3000+ USD in transactions, ensuring professionalism and reliability.Community Integrity: We strongly discourage prohibited activities such as Bitcointalk forum account buying and selling, and maintaining a clean and trustworthy environment.Our Escrow Fees: We do not charge any fees for our escrow services. But we do accept gifts, Feel free to use anyone. How It Works:Post your trade details in this thread, including the token/stakes/goods you want to buy or sell and the amountOnce you find your buyer/ seller, you can reach us as your escrow.Once both parties agree, funds and tokens are placed in escrow.Complete the transaction, and once both parties confirm, the escrow is released.Rules and Guidelines:Only members with a certain level of activity and trust are eligible for our escrow services.Do not engage in prohibited activities such as Bitcointalk forum account buying and selling within this community.Use the escrow service for added safety, and always verify the counterparty's reputation.We have the right to allow or reject any member, whether a buyer or seller, to use our escrow service if we discover anything suspicious.Disclaimer:We are not responsible for any disputes or issues arising from individual trades. However, our escrow service is designed to minimize the risks involved. Please note that our trusted escrow service provider operates independently, and any dealings with them are at your own discretion.Contact Us:If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our moderators Albon or irfan_pak10. Group Link: https://t.me/bptrades
